title: Executive Order 6575-Revocation of Executive Order No. 6237, of July 28, 1933
content: It is hereby ordered that Executive Order No. 6237, of July 28, 1933, allocating funds for the purchase of lands necessary for the completion of the Great Smoky Mountains National Park, be, and it is hereby, revoked.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6575-Revocation of Executive Order No. 6237, of July 28, 1933 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362335
